name: "Time Will Tell" Petite Lino Cuckoo Clock
description:
A petite version of the Betty Jo Cuckoo Clock. Made from vintage Linoleum, doilies and buttons.
Approx. 20 x 28cm with 30cm chain pendulums. 
Has a battery operated clock movement.

name: "Time Will Tell" Sugar Skull Lino  Clock
description:
A decorative Mexican Day of the Dead inspired Sugar Skull Clock crafted from decorative vintage lino, recycled buttons, pre-loved doilies and a fully working, battery operated clock mechanism.
This collectible piece is approx 50cmx50cm 
*Please note- Your item will differ from the image shown, making it completely and wonderfully unique! The overall look and design, however, will certainly be maintained! Please convo me with any requests for prefered colours.
Also, as these pieces have been created from vintage materials they may have some minor imperfections that are characteristic of their age and previous life.
